title: This laptop screen expander has Pre-Black Friday Sale pricing
content:
Finally give yourself a dual-screen laptop with Mobile Pixels TRIO MAX: Portable Dual Screen Laptop Monitor on sale for $254.14 (reg. $289.99) with code SAVE15NOV during the Pre-Black Friday sale. 

This extra monitor mounts to the back of your laptop and only uses one USB port for power and data transfer. Plug it in, rotate your screen as needed, and switch between tasks as easily as you would on a desktop dual-monitor setup. Brightness is fully adjustable. All you have to do is install the drivers and plug it in. 

The Mobile Pixels TRIO MAX is compatible with Mac, Linux, Chrome, and Android devices. The monitor is 14″ x 9.5″ x 0.45″ and fits great on 15 and 15.6” laptops. It’ll give you an extensive bit of extra workspace, no matter where you like to work. Get Mobile Pixels TRIO MAX: Portable Dual Screen Laptop Monitor on sale for $254.14 (reg. $289.99) with code SAVE15NOV during the Pre-Black Friday Sale.
